title: Some T210s and T209s for sale...
author: seablaster

posts.post_title: Some T210s and T209s for sale...
posts.post_content:
My album contains a couple of pages of T210s and T209s for your perusal:

[url]http://net54baseball.com/album.php?albumid=815[/url]

Please send me a PM if you find something of interest.  

All PMs replied to.  Cards which have been sold were removed from the album.  

The other album present contains T212-1 horizontals.

Thank you for your interest!
